The code which tests a performance of various caching mechanism. Originally created to test the speed of storing, updating and retreiving the data from memcached vs sharedance.

Requirements:
* memcached
* sharedance
* php modules: pcntl
* pear packages: Benchmark

Installation:
* To install memcached see following URLs:
  - http://2bits.com/articles/installing-memcached-125-and-memcache-pecl-223-ubuntu-server.html
  - http://uk3.php.net/manual/en/memcache.installation.php
* To install sharedance, download it, unpack and look into the installation instructions:
  - http://sharedance.pureftpd.org/project/sharedance
